caption.p: Time series of anomalies in annual-mean atmospheric temperature in the 50- and 40-member CanESM2 and CESM1 ALL ensembles (respectively) and in RSS, STAR, and UAH satellite data. ( A–C) Results are for TLS ( A), TMT ( B), and TLT ( C). Temperatures are spatially averaged over areas of common coverage in the simulations and satellite data (82.5°N to 82.5°S for TLS and TMT and 82.5°N to 70°S for TLT). The reference period is 1979 to 1981. STAR does not provide TLT data.
